name: ZOLO - Zombies Only Live Once
description: A Zombie, low poly cubic style, action adventure, PC VR game.Feel the brute strength with your fist punches! Experience the fire power with a large arsenal and exotic weapons! Launch your victims into thin air and score higher!
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: AMD RX 480 (or GeForce GTX 1060 3GB) Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
